# function: module_source

This function takes in `${path.module}` and return the corresponding item's `Source` in `modules.json` file in the current root module's `.terraform/module` folder



## Signature

<!-- signature generated by tfplugindocs -->
```text
module_source(module_path string) string
```

## Arguments

<!-- arguments generated by tfplugindocs -->
1. `module_path` (String) `${path.module}`
